data.title: The Rocket That Killed 12 Children in Majdal Shams Also Hit a Raw Nerve in the Relations Between the Golan Druze and Israel
data.meta_description: The Unique Situation of the Golan Heights Druze Has Been Highlighted After the Most Tragic Day in the Community's History. Stuck Between Longstanding Syrian Identity and Growing Affiliation With Israel, Especially Among Youth, This Small and Tight-knit Population Faces an Uncertain Future
